name: Nancy Boyd
what_you_do: Founder of Bright Wings, Inc. and self-described Soul Mechanic who helps people with deep transformation, blending intuition and insight with grounded strategy to align inner truth with outer action.
who_you_serve: Seekers, changemakers, and soul-driven leaders looking for deep transformation and conscious evolution.
social_proof: Survived being declared dead three times and chronic illness; background in education, coaching, spiritual study, and intuitive practice.
signature_programs: Bright Wings Press (publishing imprint, launched June 2025), The Soul Mechanic's Garage, The Soul Maintenance Circle (launching soon), The Soul Path Academy (curriculum in development), Partner with the Power to Create Your Life (book), Liquid Smudge, Flower Essences, Sacred Geometry
business_focus: Helping people achieve deep personal transformation and conscious evolution through intuitive guidance, products, and educational programs.
service_provided: Soul-level coaching and guidance, publishing (Bright Wings Press), product shop (Liquid Smudge, Flower Essences, Sacred Geometry), books, online programs
